LanguageData.MiniGeothermalGenerator.label: Mini Geothermal Generator (2x2)
LanguageData.MiniGeothermalGenerator.description: A compact geothermal generator suitable for small-scale energy needs. Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
